00021 template <class Base>
00022 class TSceneExtenderCompBase: public Base, virtual public IViewExtender
00023 {
00024 public:
00025        typedef Base BaseClass;
00026 
00027        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TSceneExtenderCompBase);
00028               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(IViewExtender);
00029               I_ASSIGN(m_slaveExtenderCompPtr, "SlaveSceneExtender", "Scene extender will be used to provide background shapes", false, "SlaveSceneExtender");
00030               I_ASSIGN_MULTI_0(m_idFiltersAttrPtr, "SceneIdFilters", "Optional scene ID filters allowing to ignore some scene providers", false);
00031        I_END_COMPONENT;
00032 
00033        // reimplemented (iqt2d::IViewExtender)
00034        virtual void AddItemsToScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr, int flags);
00035        virtual void RemoveItemsFromScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr);
00036 
00037 protected:
00038        typedef istd::TPointerVector<iview::IShape> Shapes;
00039        typedef std::map<IViewProvider*, Shapes> ShapesMap;
00040 
00041        bool IsSceneIdSupported(int id) const;
00042        const ShapesMap& GetShapesMap() const;
00043 
00044        // abstract methods
00045        virtual void CreateShapes(int sceneId, Shapes& result) = 0;
00046 
00047 private:
00048        ShapesMap m_shapesMap;
00049 
00050        I_REF(IViewExtender, m_slaveExtenderCompPtr);
00051        I_MULTIATTR(int, m_idFiltersAttrPtr);
00052 };

00058 
00059 template <class Base>
00060 void TSceneExtenderCompBase<Base>::AddItemsToScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr, int flags)
00061 {
00062        I_ASSERT(providerPtr != NULL);
00063 
00064        int id = providerPtr->GetViewId();
00065        iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = providerPtr->GetView();
00066 
00067        if ((viewPtr != NULL) && IsSceneIdSupported(id) && (m_shapesMap.find(providerPtr) == m_shapesMap.end())){
00068               Shapes& shapes = m_shapesMap[providerPtr];
00069 
00070               bool isBackground = ((flags & SF_BACKGROUND) != 0);
00071               CreateShapes(id, shapes);
00072 
00073               int shapesCount = shapes.GetCount();
00074               for (int i = 0; i < shapesCount; ++i){
00075                      iview::IShape* shapePtr = shapes.GetAt(i);
00076                      if (shapePtr != NULL){
00077                             if (isBackground){
00078                                    viewPtr->ConnectInactiveShape(shapePtr);
00079                             }
00080                             else{
00081                                    viewPtr->ConnectShape(shapePtr);
00082                             }
00083                      }
00084               }
00085        }
00086 
00087        if (m_slaveExtenderCompPtr.IsValid()){
00088               m_slaveExtenderCompPtr->AddItemsToScene(providerPtr, (flags | SF_BACKGROUND) & ~SF_DIRECT);
00089        }
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 template <class Base>
00094 void TSceneExtenderCompBase<Base>::RemoveItemsFromScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr)
00095 {
00096        I_ASSERT(providerPtr != NULL);
00097 
00098        if (m_slaveExtenderCompPtr.IsValid()){
00099               m_slaveExtenderCompPtr->RemoveItemsFromScene(providerPtr);
00100        }
00101 
00102        ShapesMap::iterator iter = m_shapesMap.find(providerPtr);
00103        if (iter != m_shapesMap.end()){
00104               iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = providerPtr->GetView();
00105 
00106               if (viewPtr != NULL){
00107                      Shapes& shapes = iter->second;
00108 
00109                      int shapesCount = shapes.GetCount();
00110                      for (int i = 0; i < shapesCount; ++i){
00111                             iview::IShape* shapePtr = shapes.GetAt(i);
00112                             if (shapePtr != NULL){
00113                                    viewPtr->DisconnectShape(shapePtr);
00114                             }
00115                      }
00116               }
00117 
00118               m_shapesMap.erase(iter);
00119        }
00120 }

00125 template <class Base>
00126 bool TSceneExtenderCompBase<Base>::IsSceneIdSupported(int id) const
00127 {
00128        if (m_idFiltersAttrPtr.IsValid()){
00129               int filtersCount = m_idFiltersAttrPtr.GetCount();
00130               for (int i = 0; i < filtersCount; ++i){
00131                      int filterId = m_idFiltersAttrPtr[i];
00132                      if (id == filterId){
00133                             return true;
00134                      }
00135               }
00136 
00137               return false;
00138        }
00139 
00140        return true;
00141 }

00144 template <class Base>
00145 const typename TSceneExtenderCompBase<Base>::ShapesMap& TSceneExtenderCompBase<Base>::GetShapesMap() const
00146 {
00147        return m_shapesMap;
00148 }
